metadata.title: CVE-2024-47730 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: hisilicon/qm - inject error before stopping queueThe master ooo cannot be completely closed when theaccelerator core reports memory error. Therefore, the driverneeds to inject the qm error to close the master ooo. Currently,the qm error is injected after stopping queue, memory may bereleased immediately after stopping queue, causing the device toaccess the released memory. Therefore, error is injected to close masterooo before stopping queue to ensure that the device does not accessthe released memory.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
